description.value: ValueSet for HIV Status for IMMZ.D1.DE10.

text.value: Indicates if the client has received a birth dose and/or supplementary dose

Indicates if the client has completed the primary vaccination series of a product/antigen. If the client has not yet completed their primary series, it means they may be expected to receive more doses to complete their vaccination regimen for the respective product/antigen.
The date when the client completed the primary vaccination series - per product/antigen
The current human immunodeficiency virus HIV status of the client
The client is known to be immunocompromised or immunosuppressed. This means the client has a weakened immune system and having a reduced ability to fight infections and other diseases
The client is currently receiving antiretroviral therapy ART
The infant is known to be exposed to HIV, i.e. born to an HIV-infected woman
The client is known to have achieved immune reconstitution
The client is known to be severely immunocompromised or immunosuppressed
The date on which the client started or restarted antiretroviral therapy ART
